profile.description:
More than 2 years of experience in web pentesting, ethical hacking, server management, movil FrontEnd and BackEnd development. Passionate about new technologies and especially new ethical hacking techniques and exploits.
My purpose is to develop applications that help the safety of people, as well as companies that require it.
